outputs.output_descr: (i) National capacity is strengthened for the sustainable management of natural resources with the involvement of civil society and integrates the fight against poverty, the sustainable use of biodiversity and sustainable land use management. (ii)  National capacities to fight against land degradation and desertification are strengthened.

project_descr: Conservation of globally significant biodiversity and sustainable use of ecosystem services in Algeria's cultural parks.
